strapiPost.title: Arkansas Shakespeare Theatre Performing At U of A Global Campus Theatre This Week
strapiPost.content:
After a two-year hiatus, Arkansas Shakespeare Theatre is returning for the summer of 2022 with Shakespeare's Much Ado About Nothing. 

  • Coming together: Arkansas Shakespeare Theatre is the state's only professional Shakespeare company and is headquartered at the University of Central Arkansas campus. With the festival's return this year, the Shakespeare company and the University of Arkansas in Fayetteville have formed a new partnership.
  • Curtains up: The Arkansas Shakespeare Theatre intends to invest in the talent and resources at the U of A, including its stage. The company will perform Much Ado About Nothing at the University of Arkansas Global Campus Theatre June 16-18. Tickets are $15 and free for students. 

For more information and tickets, click HERE.
